In England, in the seven days to 25 July, there were 198,000 new confirmed cases (351.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 18 July, there were 304,374 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 35% (106,374 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 30 July is 5,090,505 (9,043.8 cases per 100,000 population).
